overview: Roberth Fuentes uses his body to perform and uses the camera as a tool to not only document and make films, he tells a story of himself and his community. Roberth deals with the many issues facing him and his community including environmental issues, specifically garbage and plastic in our oceans. Coming from a family of fishermen himself, the issues connected to the sea are dear to him. Bantayan Island mainly relies on the sea for income and food, his mission is to use his work to bring awareness on his home island but also to other places because we are connected.
title: Basura
